definition: root/basis/classifier for long slender objects, e.g. cigarettes, guitar strings/CL:條|条[tiao2]/radical (chemistry)

sentences.english: Civilized etiquette of our study is a foundation, is the healthy growth of our arms.
sentences.chinese: 文明礼仪是我们学习的根基，是我们健康成长的臂膀。

sentences.english: The root and culture of Harlem is black history.
sentences.chinese: 哈莱姆文化的根基是黑人历史。

sentences.english: Truthfulness is at the foundation of all personal excellence.
sentences.chinese: 诚实是一切个人优秀品质的根基。

sentences.english: So, exalted mitzvah is a basis that leads cadre politics life.
sentences.chinese: 所以，高尚的德行是一个领导干部政治生命的根基。

sentences.english: Our people-first philosophy has always been the bedrock of our value system.
sentences.chinese: 我们“以人为本”的理念一直是公司价值体系的根基。

sentences.english: He taught them that the Word of God is our foundation.
sentences.chinese: 耶稣教他们上帝的话是我们的根基。

sentences.english: As the most important painting is of pedantic, but the foundation is still the most important thing.
sentences.chinese: 作画自然是书卷气为重，但是根基还是最要紧的。

sentences.english: For instance, how you manage invoicing and accounting is part of your foundation.
sentences.chinese: 比如说，怎样管理发票和帐目就是根基的一部分。

sentences.english: Bandwidth decides oscillograph measures ability basically to signal.
sentences.chinese: 带宽抉择示波器对信号的根基测量能力。

sentences.english: The house of God should stand on its own.
sentences.chinese: 而上帝之屋应该立于自己的根基之上。

sentences.english: For their foundation is built on the love of money.
sentences.chinese: 因为他们的根基是建立在贪恋钱财上。

sentences.english: Turkey and Brazil are fundamentally strong countries that have been whacked by the markets.
sentences.chinese: 土耳其和巴西是曾经股市疲软的根基强壮的国家。

sentences.english: We believe fervent and unceasing prayer should under-gird all our ministries and personal life.
sentences.chinese: 我们相信火热与恒久的祷告是我们事奉与生活的根基。

sentences.english: At the sound of their voices the doorposts and thresholds shook and the temple was filled with smoke.
sentences.chinese: 因呼喊者的声音，门槛的根基震动，殿充满了烟云。

sentences.english: Classic : Man exists in erotic tension toward the divine ground of his existence.
sentences.chinese: 人活在一种对其存在的神性根基的爱欲的紧张中。

sentences.english: Our trade is conducted on the basis of equality.
sentences.chinese: 咱们是在平等的根蒂根基上进行商业。

definition: to stand/to have a footing/to be established/to base oneself on
to lay (a foundation)/to conquer (a city etc)/to shoot down (a bird etc)
settle down and get on with one's pursuit
to sway/to waver/to rock/to rattle/to destabilize/to pose a challenge to
